Layout

A standardized layout provides a consistent and cohesive user experience with flexibility to incorporate common and dynamic page elements, as well as different ad sizes.

 

The column class should be put on the containing div.

<div class="col-md-1">
....
</div>

What it is...

The Peretz layout style is based on a responsive, mobile-first, fluid grid system that appropriately scales up to 12 columns as the device or view port size increases with a max-width of 1700px. The default layout is iPad landscape 1024px x 768px with a 20px gutter on each side. The edge of the panel within the content area is also 20px. The grid itself is 12 columns, with a 10px gutter between them.

Implementation

Extra small devices Phones (<768px) Small devices Tablets (<768px) Medium devices Desktops (<992px) Large devices Desktops (<1200px)
Grid behavior Horizontal at all times Collapsed to start, horizontal above breakpoints
Container width Fluid (auto) Fluid (auto) Fluid (auto) Fluid (auto)
Class prefix .col-xs- .col-sm- .col-md- .col-lg-
# of columns 12
Column width Auto Auto Auto Auto
Gutter width 10px (5px on each side of a column)
Nestable Yes
Offsets Yes
Column ordering Yes

12 Column Layout

12 Column Layout with 260px left panel open

12 Column Layout with 260px right panel open

12 Column Layout for iPhone
